block_info.label: Function Approximation
block_info.description: Function Approximation block targeted for AI Engines.

parameters.name: data_type
parameters.description: describes the type of individual input output data samples of the function.
parameters.label: Input/Output data type:

parameters.name: specify_lut_values
parameters.description: choose lut values for available functions or specify own lut values.
parameters.label: Function:

parameters.name: TP_USE_LUT_RELOAD
parameters.description: Flag to indicate if LUT reloading is used
parameters.label: Specify LUT Values via input port

parameters.name: coarse_bits
parameters.description: Describes the number of bits in a sample of input data that will be used to address the provided lookup table.
parameters.label: Coarse bits:

parameters.name: fine_bits
parameters.description: Describes the number of bits in an input data sample used for fine interpolation.
parameters.label: Fine bits:

parameters.name: domain_mode
parameters.description: Specifies a mode for the input domain of the chosen function for approximation.
parameters.label: Input domain:

parameters.name: num_frames
parameters.description: describes number of samples to be processed in each call to this function.
parameters.label: Input window size:

parameters.name: shift_output
parameters.description: describes the number of bits to downshift.
parameters.label: Scale output down by 2^:

parameters.name: rnd_mode
parameters.description: describes the selection of rounding to be applied during the shift down stage of processing.
parameters.label: Rounding mode:

parameters.name: sat_mode
parameters.description: describes the selection of saturation to be applied during the shift down stage of processing.
parameters.label: Saturation mode:
